description.content:
Are you a die-heart football fan? Then you can't miss playing Football Stars!

Football Stars is a challenging soccer game with enticing graphics and pleasant sounds where the player needs to score more goals than the opponent to win matches.

In this fun-to-play game, you will be playing a football match against your opponent. You will get 90 seconds for a single match in which you need to make as many goals as you can to beat the opponent.

If you are playing on mobile phone, use the right/left keys on the screen to move the player; high, ground, and head shot keys to kick the ball.

If you are playing on the desktop, use the keyboard right/left arrow keys to move the player; A key for high kick, D key for ground kick, and Up arrow key for head kick.

Your first character is fixed. You need to earn coins to unlock other characters. Each goal carries 15 Coins. The more goals you make in every match, the higher coins you will earn to avail the superpowers.

Superpowers? Let's reveal another top secret of the game too!

We also give you the option to gain special powers to beat your opponents. Want to know how?

There are 3 superpowers you can use to win matches easily.
1. Opponent Freezing Power- With this power, you can freeze your opponent for a few seconds and make your goal without any hindrance.
2. A Goalie- A goalkeeper will appear on the screen to stop your opponent from making the goals.
3. A Giant Goal- With the help of this power you can increase the size of the opponent's goal net to shoot the ball easily.

How can you avail the superpowers?
To take advantage of the powers, you need to earn coins equal to or more than 200. Once your coin count reaches 200, you will be able to avail the superpowers from the shop icon.

Sounds interesting to you? Then what are you waiting for?
Experience the legendary football experience with Football Stars!

Basket Champ is a single tap-based game that comes with some amazing graphics. The game theme gets changed on clearing of 5 levels.

You need to tap on the screen to hit the ball towards the basket. At first look, the game can look very easy and simple to you but trust me it's not that much easy. 

You should have some patience to dunk the ball in the basket as you will face challenges to do it.

Don't let the bouncy ball go down otherwise you will be kicked out of the game.

Be ready with your flippers and show some basketball skills to dunk balls in the basket to become the next basketball star!

ONU Live is a classic card multiplayer game that offers endless entertainment for players of all ages.

ONU Live comes with a twist. In this strategy card game, the goal is to be the first player to empty their hand of cards before the countdown timer reaches zero. Match your card with the top card of the pile by either color, number, or symbol. But watch out for special action cards like Skip, Reverse, Draw Two, Wild card, and Draw Four which can turn the tide of the game in an instant! You get 15 seconds for your turn.

Check out the ‘Rules’ section if you are not aware of the gameplay of ONU game.

What’s the twist then? There are two ways to win this ONU game. Either you finish your cards before the time limit i.e. five minutes or score the lowest to win. The fewer the points, the higher the rank! But how do you calculate your score?

Each card in all the color categories has a score of its face value. You will get a score on the total of the face value of the remaining cards. If your score count is less than your competitor, you will win the game. Hence, ensure that you discard higher point cards first. If you are done with your cards before the time, your score will be zero as there are no remaining cards at hand and you will be at the highest rank. Conversely, if any player leaves the game in the middle, he/she will be scored the highest i.e. 2000 points and the lowest rank.

There are 3 modes of play – 2 Players, 3 Players, and 4 Players. Select whichever you would like to play and strategize to win this endless fun card game.

So grab your cards, choose your strategy, and play "ONU Live"

Challenge your logical thinking and problem-solving skills with Sudoku X, the ultimate free classic puzzle game!

Sudoku X is an addictive brain sudoku puzzle game that offers an immersive gameplay experience that will keep you coming back for more. With puzzles ranging from easy to pro levels, Sudoku X is the perfect game for Sudoku enthusiasts of all levels.

Whether you would like to train your brain or want to pass the time productively, do it with this logic-based number puzzle game. Choose from easy, medium, and pro difficulty levels to suit your skill level and challenge yourself accordingly. New puzzles are added regularly to keep the game fresh and exciting.

You can play easy and medium levels directly but to play the pro level, you need to collect 200 coins. Earn coins by playing the easy and medium levels and then redeem those coins to unlock the pro level. 


How to get coins?

Complete the puzzles to earn coins. Solving puzzles from different levels earns you a different number of coins.

New users get 50 coins as welcoming reward points.

Wach ads to get extra 20 coins.

Explore the shop icon to check out the numerous themes available. Redeem your earned coins to purchase the themes and customize your gameplay!

So, what are you waiting for? Play Sudoku X today and start challenging your mind with the ultimate Sudoku puzzle game!

Carrom Live brings the classic Carrom board game to life. Experience the thrill of playing carrom with this easy-to-play online multiplayer carrom game!

With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Carrom Live is a physics-based online carrom game that offers a gaming experience that's easy to pick up but difficult to master.
If you're new to the game, don't worry - mastering carrom is easy and fun. The gameplay is to strategically flick the striker to put the pucks into the pockets.

Compete against players worldwide in two thrilling multiplayer game modes: Disc Pool and Freestyle.

Disc Pool - In Disc Pool mode, you need to shoot only your allotted color carrom pucks into the pockets to win the match. There is no 'Queen' puck in this mode. Simply, strategize your shots to pocket all your carrom discs before your opponent does. You lose your turn if you pot the sticker. You let the opponent earn points on potting his/her puck.

Freestyle - In Freestyle mode, you need to hit all the pucks and achieve the target score to win the match. The scoring system is as follows: +10 for pocketing the black disc, +20 for the white disc, and +50 for the Queen. The target score to win is 120. You lose your puck points if you pot the striker and that puck is returned to the board as a penalty. Also, the Queen has to be covered by the other puck. It's a foul if you pocket the final puck before covering the queen.

In Carrom Live, players can personalize their gaming experience by purchasing their favorite pucks, stickers, and boards using coins earned through gameplay. As a new user, you get 300 coins. There is also a daily reward of 400 coins after every 24 hours.

So, are you up for the career challenge?
Let's flick those pucks, aim for the pockets, and see who's the champ! Enjoy the real Carrom board game and become the Carrom master with Carrom Live!

Do you have match-winning skills? You are the last wicket and you have to score as much as you can to lead your team to victory. So wear your helmet & pad up to be a match-winner. Improve your batting skills & show some cool cricket shots with 'Cricket 2024'.

Cards 21 is a highly addictive strategy card game! If you enjoy solving puzzles or playing classic card games like Solitaire or Spades, you'll love Cards 21. How to play? It's an easy-to-play game where you start with 3 lives. There are four platforms where you need to place your cards, and the goal is simple: make each column add up to 21. Sounds easy, right? But here's the twist: You can only use up to 5 cards to reach 21 in any column. If you exceed 5 cards or go over 21, you lose a life. The good news? There's no time limit, so you can play at your own pace! Special Features for Extra Points: Score 31 points by creating a Dynamite (an Ace paired with a King, Queen, or 10). Score 41 points with a Blackjack (Ace of Spades paired with Jack of Spades). Score 41 points by using one 3 card and three 6 cards. Score 51 points by using three 7 cards of any suit. This simple yet challenging card game will keep your mind engaged for hours of fun. Try Cards 21 now and see how long you can last!
Step into thrilling penalty shootouts as a striker or goalkeeper. Enjoy realistic gameplay and intense soccer action.
Dive into the ultimate word search challenge with a sports twist! Test your skills and uncover hidden sports terms in thrilling puzzles. Enjoy immersive gameplay and sharpen your sports vocabulary.
Explore the world of movies with challenging crosswords! Test your film knowledge across genres and uncover hidden trivia in every puzzle. Perfect for movie buffs and casual players alike.
MUDGAMES is a web gaming destination with in-house developed gaming catalog of 100+ titles. The focus on MUDGAMES as a platform is to boost inclusive social engagement via gaming.

Jungle Bricks is a highly addictive game that comes with a Jungle theme in which a jungle boy collects lots of fruits(such as apples, grapes, cherries) in his pocket by breaking bricks.

Aim the target and shoot balls to break maximum bricks in one go to help the Jungle boy to get more fruits. You need to break all the bricks on the screen to complete the stage.

A number displays on every brick that indicates how many times you need to hit the brick with the ball to break.
But, make sure that any of the bricks never touch the bottom.

As you progress in the game the levels would get difficult to complete.

Enjoy the endless fun loving game and clear as many stages as possible to make more & more score.

Stud Rider is a cool game in which you have to collect fuels for more power. Use left-right buttons to make awesome flips. Go through hills and make a perfect ride.

So, what are you waiting for? Accelerate your bike and be a real stud.

A game on Lord Krishna. We all know the childhood miracles of Lord Krishna. It's a Janmashtami season and let's knock down Dahi handi on this holy occasion. Krishna Jump is a very cute game on Krishan Ji that comes up with cute graphics and lovely sound effects. Lead the little Lord Krishna towards his target by jumping on the next platform without losing your balance. To give you a desirable feel of Janmashtami, we have added 5 beautiful themes and pleasant sounds in it. After breaking each Dahi Handi, the theme gets changed. Be the little Krishna and try to break maximum Dahi Handi's. Another good way to celebrate this beautiful Indian festival ```Janmashtami```.

Experience the Tetris game like never before with the "Aqua Blocks".
Aqua Blocks is an ultimate casual puzzle game that comes up with cute water graphics and lovely sound effects.

The goal is to create a vertical or horizontal line of blocks. Drag and drop the blocks in the right place to fit them.
Three different shapes will see at a time to make up the shape placement in your mind.

For your help, you also get an Aqua Power which helps you to remove a horizontally and vertically block line from the board. Just tap on the power to use it.

Strategically places all the blocks because no space left will lead you to game over.
Clear more and more lines to make good scores.

Aqua Blocks is the game that can keep the casual gamers entertained for hours.

Cards 21 is a highly addictive strategy card game! If you enjoy solving puzzles or playing classic card games like Solitaire or Spades, you'll love Cards 21. How to play? It's an easy-to-play game where you start with 3 lives. There are four platforms where you need to place your cards, and the goal is simple: make each column add up to 21. Sounds easy, right? But here's the twist: You can only use up to 5 cards to reach 21 in any column. If you exceed 5 cards or go over 21, you lose a life. The good news? There's no time limit, so you can play at your own pace! Special Features for Extra Points: Score 31 points by creating a Dynamite (an Ace paired with a King, Queen, or 10). Score 41 points with a Blackjack (Ace of Spades paired with Jack of Spades). Score 41 points by using one 3 card and three 6 cards. Score 51 points by using three 7 cards of any suit. This simple yet challenging card game will keep your mind engaged for hours of fun. Try Cards 21 now and see how long you can last!

list.title: DFB Pokal Quaterfinal: Bayer Leverkusen VS FC Köln

description.content: Two fierce rivals, Bayer Leverkusen and FC Köln, face off in a high-stakes clash for a place in the DFB-Pokal semi-finals. With both teams hungry for victory, expect a thrilling encounter packed with intense drama, passion, and top-tier football action.

list.title: DFB-Pokal Quaterfinal: VfB Stuttgart VS FC Augsburg

description.content: Get ready for an exciting game as VfB Stuttgart takes on FC Augsburg in a high-stakes match! Watch as these two Bundesliga giants battle it out for glory in the prestigious DFB-Pokal.

India's Test cricket journey began in 1932 at Lord's, under the captaincy of the late Col. C. K. Naidu, affectionately known as 'C. K.' In 1956, the President of India awarded him the Padma Bhushan. The film also features a dialogue between Syed Mushtaq Ali, an elegant batsman, and Vijay Merchant.

This documentary film examines the game of hockey—how it began, how it was introduced to India, and how it developed to the point where India is now a leading hockey nation, culminating in our victory at the Olympics in Tokyo.
